meanings.definition: A semi-solid dairy product made from fermented milk.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating yogurt for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The yogurt in the fridge is about to expire.
meanings.sent3: The yogurt decided to take a nap in the cool refrigerator.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as creamy and comforting as a spoonful of yogurt.
meanings.sent5: The moon looked like a giant bowl of yogurt hanging in the sky.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume yogurt as a food.
meanings.sent1: She likes to yogurt with fresh fruits for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent2: We yogurt together after our workout.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to yogurt the fish but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: His words yogurted in her mind long after he had left.
meanings.sent5: The idea of success yogurted in her thoughts, motivating her to work harder.
